abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.
abort.configured_via_yaml: Configuration impored from configuration.yaml. Remove entry from configuration.yaml, restart, and re-add this integration to proceed.

error.missing_credentials: This cluster requires authentication. Please provide a username and password.
error.untrusted_connection: Elasticsearch's server certificate could not be verified. Either disable TLS verification, or specify a custom CA path below.
error.unsupported_version: Unsupported version of Elastcsearch detected. The minimum supported version is 7.11.0.

user.title: Fill in your Elasticsearch login information

data.ssl_ca_path: Fully qualified path to custom certificate authority

abort.configured_via_yaml: Configuration impored from configuration.yaml. Remove entry from configuration.yaml, restart, and re-add this integration to proceed.

data.publish_frequency: How frequently events are published, in seconds
data.publish_mode: Choose which entity states to publish
data.excluded_domains: Domains to exclude from publishing. Defaults to none.
data.excluded_entities: Entities to exclude from publishing. Defaults to none.
data.included_domains: Domains to publish. Defaults to all domains.
data.included_entities: Entities to publish. Defaults to all entities.
data.index_format: The index name prefix to publish events to
data.alias: The index alias used for writing events to Elasticsearch
